metadata.title: CVE-2022-3113 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.16-rc6.mtk_vcodec_fw_vpu_init indrivers/media/platform/mtk-vcodec/mtk_vcodec_fw_vpu.c lacks check of thereturn value of devm_kzalloc() and will cause the null pointer dereference.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
